Vampirtron:
     "Okay," Vampirtron said following her. "After I get settled we should talk to Rodimus about my ship and what he wants to do with it."
 airly2000 wrote:Nighlight::


Nightlight looking towards Vampirtron said "well he will be in cr a 
while more, let's go"

Nightlight left the medical bay and started to walk in the corritors
